Scopronok runs up to Darkmouse. He pulls out a device and presses the 
button. The device was made to make a bot in Beast mode into rpbot 
mode.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::DarkMouse/KitKat::
> 
> DarkMouse::
> She runs and is hit by the darts.  She keeps running.  She runs 
until 
> it takes effect and she collapses.  She falls and drops her pet
onto 
> the ground. Out cold.
> 
> 
> KitKat::
> She stops and stands next to Darkmouse.  Panting heavily, "Good
shot 
> commander. We got her. You carry her, I'll get the smaller rodent."
> With her internal repairs fixing her shoulder, she transformes into 
> bot mode.  She picks up the rat. "I wonder why she was taking this 
> small rat with her? Huh?" 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, crow_lord@h... wrote:
> > Scorponok 
> > 
> > 
> > Scorponok runs after Darkmouse, He aims his Trinconizer gun 
alittle 
> > ahead of Darkmouse. "She will run right into the Trinconizer." He 
> > fires 3 times.
